languages.text: "Держите свои ужимки и руки при себе. Я лишь слежу, чтобы реликвии династии не оказались у перекупщиков Миссии Касбаллики".
"Kindly keep your antics to yourself — and your hands too. I am merely making sure that the dynasty's relics do not end up in the inventory of some Kasballican fence."
languages.original_text: "Держите свои ужимки и руки при себе. Я лишь слежу, чтобы реликвии династии не оказались у перекупщиков Миссии Касбаллики".

traits.locale_text: "Kindly keep your antics to yourself — and your hands too. I am merely making sure that the dynasty's relics do not end up in the inventory of a Kasballican fence."
"Kindly keep your antics to yourself — and your hands too. I am merely making sure that the dynasty's relics do not end up in the inventory of a Kasballican fence."
"Kindly keep your antics to yourself — and your hands too. I am merely making sure that the dynasty's relics do not end up in the inventory of some Kasballican fence."
"Kindly keep your antics to yourself — and your hands too. I am merely making sure that the dynasty's relics do not end up in the inventory of some Kasballican fence."
"Kindly keep your antics to yourself — and your hands too. I am merely making sure that the dynasty's relics do not end up in the inventory of some Kasballican fence."
"Kindly keep your antics to yourself — and your hands too. I am merely making sure that the dynasty's relics do not end up in the inventory of some Kasballican fence."
"Kindly keep your antics to yourself — and your hands too. I am merely making sure that the dynasty's relics do not end up in the inventory of some Kasballican fence."

languages.text: "Behaltet Euren Unfug bitte für Euch — und Eure Hände bei Euch. Ich sorge lediglich dafür, dass die Relikte der Dynastie nicht im Inventar irgendeines Kasballica-Hehlers landen."
languages.original_text: "Kindly keep your antics to yourself — and your hands too. I am merely making sure that the dynasty's relics do not end up in the inventory of some Kasballican fence."

traits.locale_text: "Behaltet Euren Unfug bitte für Euch — und Eure Hände bei Euch. Ich sorge lediglich dafür, dass die Relikte der Dynastie nicht im Inventar irgendeines Kasballica-Hehlers landen."

languages.text: « Épargnez-moi vos pitreries, et gardez vos mains dans vos poches, je vous prie. Je tiens simplement à m'assurer que les reliques de la dynastie ne finissent pas dans l'inventaire de quelque receleur de la Kasballica. »
languages.original_text: "Kindly keep your antics to yourself — and your hands too. I am merely making sure that the dynasty's relics do not end up in the inventory of some Kasballican fence."

traits.locale_text: « Épargnez-moi vos pitreries, et gardez vos mains dans vos poches, je vous prie. Je tiens simplement à m'assurer que les reliques de la dynastie ne finissent pas dans l'inventaire de quelque receleur de la Kasballica. »

languages.text: «Guárdese las insinuaciones... y las manos. Solo pretendo asegurarme de que las reliquias de la dinastía no acaban en el inventario de algún perista de la Kasballica».
languages.original_text: "Kindly keep your antics to yourself — and your hands too. I am merely making sure that the dynasty's relics do not end up in the inventory of some Kasballican fence."

traits.locale_text: «Guárdese las insinuaciones... y las manos. Solo pretendo asegurarme de que las reliquias de la dinastía no acaban en el inventario de algún perista de la Kasballica».

languages.text: 「おふざけは慎みなさい。手も引っ込めて。私はただ、王朝の遺物がどこかのカスバリカの在庫にならないようにしただけなのだから」
languages.original_text: "Kindly keep your antics to yourself — and your hands too. I am merely making sure that the dynasty's relics do not end up in the inventory of some Kasballican fence."

traits.locale_text: 「おふざけは慎みなさい。手も引っ込めて。私はただ、王朝の遺物がどこかのカスバリカの在庫にならないようにしただけなのだから」

languages.text: “请不要乱用那些古怪的小伎俩，也希望你的手不要到处乱碰。我只想确保王朝的圣物不会莫名变成某个卡斯巴利卡成员的私人物品。”
languages.original_text: "Kindly keep your antics to yourself — and your hands too. I am merely making sure that the dynasty's relics do not end up in the inventory of some Kasballican fence."

traits.locale_text: “请不要乱用那些古怪的小伎俩，也希望你的手不要到处乱碰。我只想确保王朝的圣物不会莫名变成某个卡斯巴利卡成员的私人物品。”

languages.original_text: "Kindly keep your antics to yourself — and your hands too. I am merely making sure that the dynasty's relics do not end up in the inventory of some Kasballican fence."

languages.text: "Soytarılıklarını kendine saklamanı rica ediyorum. Ellerine de hâkim ol. Burada hanedanlık yadigârlarının bir Kasballica pazarının deposunda yer almaması için çabalıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Kindly keep your antics to yourself — and your hands too. I am merely making sure that the dynasty's relics do not end up in the inventory of some Kasballican fence."
